Articles.Content: I've had this happen sporadically in the last patch too, but it occurs more regularly for me in 1.3. Anyone else experience this issue or know how to fix it or have a better work around than switching to the Space Center than back to the vehicle?

I have this problem too, in 1.2.2. I found that it only happened when the camera was in a certain position.

What mods do you have installed?

26 minutes ago, Jas0n said:

I have this problem too, in 1.2.2. I found that it only happened when the camera was in a certain position.

What mods do you have installed?

Yeah, I noticed the text will appear normal with the camera at certain angles.

I'm running quite a few mods, the main ones being RSS, Interstellar, SSTU low part count solutions, USI life support, SCANSat, etc. and a bunch of little things. Any way to generate a list of mods your game is running?

ksp avc  allows you to copy the list of the mods it detected to the clipboard.

Edited June 16, 2017 by ssd21345

If you post your KSP.log or your output_log.txt it will have a list of installed mods included within it (it will also tell us if there are any major problems). Please don't post them directly into the post, instead put it on DropBox or GoogleDrive and post a link to it
